title: Why do we have to pay just to get characters
body: It is absurd that they are demanding money just to play a game. Why are they being so selfish and not making it so that the public can enjoy it. When I say this I am referring to rp and how you must buy it in order to get any character worth anything. I highly advise that they give better ways to obtain these point for free or else they are going to loose many people's interests in the game.

replies.body: No RP is required to unlock any character in the game. Save up your IP, all champs can be obtained for free...
You can get any champion for free with Influence Points (IP) that are earned when you play the game. Of course you can ALSO buy them with money, but _almost_ no one does that.
This is a new one xD

There's a rotating list of 10 champions that are free to play each week to give everyone a taste of all the champions. On top of that, you don't actually have to spend any money whatsoever to obtain all the champions. You can always save your IP/BE to purchase those champs as well as getting them from Hextech chests too.
